content:
Sounds like you've got a fun weekend planned! Searching online for tailors in your area is a great idea. You can also check if there are any tailors or seamstresses at the mall or outlet mall you're planning to visit. Sometimes, they have alteration services or tailor shops within the mall itself.

While you're at the mall, it's a great idea to pick up some new socks to go with your new jeans. You might also consider checking if they have any tailor or alteration services that can help with your sweater repair. Some department stores or menswear shops may offer alteration services, so it's worth asking around.

Remember to take your sweater with you to the mall, so you can show it to the tailor and get a more accurate estimate of the repair cost and time required. Have a great time shopping, and I hope you find a great tailor to fix your favorite sweater!
